pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tensor-Train Decomposition // Tensor-train is a compact representation for higher-order tensors. Some algorithms for performing tensor-train decomposition are available such as TT- SVD, TT-WOPT, and TT-Cross. For the details of the algorithms, see I. V. Oseledets (2011) doi:10.1137/090752286, Yuan Longao, et al (2017) arXiv:1709.02641, I. V. Oseledets (2010) doi:10.1016/j.laa.2009.07.024.
